Package: grails.transaction

[Groovy] Annotation Type Rollback

    • grails.transaction.Rollback

    • A transforms that applies a transaction that always rolls back. Useful for testing. See Transactional

      Authors:
      Graeme Rocher
      Since:
      2.4

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          boolean value()
          Whether or not the transaction for the annotated method should be rolled back after the method has completed.

      • Inherited Methods Summary

          Inherited Methods 
          Methods inherited from class Name

      • Method Detail

        • boolean value()

          Whether or not the transaction for the annotated method should be rolled back after the method has completed. @default true
